report.title: Brief Notes
report.author: Zam
report.bodytext: I was a little surprised that I repeatedly got CNS effects from taking prednisone to treat a skin issue. I got very noticeable mental effects starting 20-30 minutes after ingestion of 20+ mg prednisone. /n /n I felt a bit stimulated, a tightness in my stomach/chest, sort of like /n I've taken a solid dose of ephedrine or too much caffeine. Continuing hints of nervousness and discomfort in the stomach. /n /n 3 days in a row, for a couple hours after taking the prednisone. On the third day I waited to take it for several hours after I got up and waited til I'd had a full bowl of soup and it still had the same effect. /n /n Partner who had taken prednisone recently found herself with mood swings after taking a single 10mg dose of prednisone.
